verses.verse: I saw<WH7200> the Lord<WH136> standing<WH5324> beside the altar,<WH4196> and he said,<WH559> "Strike<WH5221> the tops<WH3730> of the pillars,<WH5592> that the thresholds may shake;<WH7493> and break<WH1214> them in pieces on the head<WH7218> of all of them;<WH2026> and I will kill the last<WH319> of them with the sword:<WH2719> there shall not one of them flee<WH5127> away,<WH5127> and there shall not<WH4422> one of them escape.<WH6412>
Though they dig<WH2864> into Sheol,<WH7585> there my hand<WH3027> will take<WH3947> them;<WH5927> and though they climb up to heaven,<WH8064> there I will bring them down.<WH3381>

Though they hide<WH2244> themselves in the top<WH7218> of Carmel,<WH3760> I will search<WH2664> and take them out<WH3947> there;<WH5641> and though they be hidden from my sight<WH5869> in the bottom<WH7172> of the sea,<WH3220> there I will command<WH6680> the serpent,<WH5175> and it will bite them.<WH5391>

Though they go<WH3212> into captivity<WH7628> before<WH6440> their enemies,<WH341> there I will command<WH6680> the sword,<WH2719> and it will kill<WH2026> them.<WH7760> I will set my eyes<WH5869> on them for evil,<WH7451> and not for good.<WH2896>

For the Lord,<WH136> Yahweh<WH3069> of Armies,<WH6635> is he who touches<WH5060> the land<WH776> and it melts,<WH4127> and all who dwell<WH3427> in it will mourn;<WH56> and it will rise up<WH5927> wholly like the River,<WH2975> and will sink<WH8257> again,<WH2975> like the River of Egypt.<WH4714>

It is he who builds<WH1129> his rooms<WH4609> in the heavens,<WH8064> and has founded<WH3245> his vault<WH92> on the earth;<WH776> he who calls<WH7121> for the waters<WH4325> of the sea,<WH3220> and pours them out<WH8210> on the surface<WH6440> of the earth;<WH776> Yahweh<WH3068> is his name.<WH8034>

Are you not like the children<WH1121> of the Ethiopians<WH3569> to me,<WH1121> children of Israel?<WH3478>" says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068> "Haven't<WH5927> I brought up Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and the Philistines<WH6430> from Caphtor,<WH3731> and the Syrians<WH758> from Kir?<WH7024>

Behold,<WH5869> the eyes of the Lord<WH136> Yahweh<WH136> are on the sinful<WH2403> kingdom,<WH4467> and I will destroy<WH8045> it from off the surface<WH6440> of the earth;<WH127> except<WH657> that I will not utterly<WH8045> destroy<WH8045> the house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290>" says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068>

"For,<WH6680> behold, I will command, and I will sift<WH5128> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> among all the nations,<WH1471> as grain is sifted<WH5128> in a sieve,<WH3531> yet not the least kernel<WH6872> will fall<WH5307> on the earth.<WH776>
All the sinners<WH2400> of my people<WH5971> will die<WH4191> by the sword,<WH2719> who say,<WH559> <WH7451> 'Evil won't<WH5066> overtake nor meet us.<WH6923>'

In that day<WH3117> I will raise up<WH6965> the tent<WH5521> of David<WH1732> who is fallen,<WH5307> and close up<WH1443> its breaches,<WH6556> and I will raise up<WH6965> its ruins,<WH2034> and I will build<WH1129> it as in the days<WH3117> of old;<WH5769>
that they may possess<WH3423> the remnant<WH7611> of Edom,<WH123> and all the nations<WH1471> who are called<WH7121> by my name,<WH8034>" says<WH5002> Yahweh<WH3068> who does this.<WH6213>

"Behold,<WH3117> the days come,<WH935>" says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> "that the plowman<WH2790> shall overtake<WH5066> the reaper,<WH7114> and the one treading<WH1869> grapes<WH6025> him who sows<WH4900> seed;<WH2233> and sweet wine<WH6071> will drip<WH5197> from the mountains,<WH1389> and flow<WH4127> from the hills.<WH1389>

I will bring my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> back<WH7725> from captivity,<WH7622> and they will rebuild<WH1129> the ruined<WH8074> cities,<WH5892> and inhabit<WH3427> them;<WH5193> and they will plant vineyards,<WH3754> and drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196> from them.<WH6213> They shall also make gardens,<WH1593> and eat<WH398> their fruit.<WH6529>
I will plant<WH5193> them on their land,<WH127> and they will no more be plucked up<WH5428> out of their land<WH127> which I have given<WH5414> them,<WH559>" says Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
